meaningMnemonic: My <kanji>various</kanji> <kanji>buddies</kanji>! Wait, that didn't come out right. <vocabulary>Gentlemen</vocabulary>! <vocabulary>My friends</vocabulary>! There we go, much better.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
